full_summary:
**ITT – NAFC G10 Roof Replacement (Invitation to Qualify)**
================================ advertiser영=====================

### Solicitation Information

*   **Reference**: WS4022331909-Doc4058774204
*   **Solicitation**: WS4022331909
*   **Publish Date**: 2023-06-16
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-11T14:00:00 (NOW EXPIRED)
*   **Contract Type**: Invitation to Qualify (public procurement category: CNST)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding

### Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans – Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre has a need for the replacement of the roof of module G10 at White Hills, St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador. The contractor shall complete the work within 20 weeks of the contract award.

### Prerequisites and Requirements

*   Only pre-qualified firms who qualified under the Invitation to Qualify process posted publicly on [CanadaBuys](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice-pub/WS4022331909#Specifications%20and%20Documentation) can submit a bid.
*   The contractor must have appropriate expertise in roofing and siding services.

### Tender Requirements

*   Estimated cost: $100,001 to $500,000
*   Site visit: Not scheduled; site visit prior to submitting a bid is recommended.
*   Language of submission: Bids may be submitted in either English or French.

### Contact Information

*   Nicole Fesseha
*   Contracting Authority
*   Public Services and Procurement Canada
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   Email: [nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note:
*   All enquiries are to be submitted to the Contracting Authority using the Messages function in SAP Ariba. 
*   All enquiries should be received no less than seven calendar days prior to the closing date. 

The RFP issuing office is: Atlantic Region Acquisitions. This office provides services in English. Proposals may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
